name: Minga Indígena #1
description: An #NFT to support the struggle of the indigenous people in Colombia. The image is the Wiphala, a square emblem representing some native peoples of the Andes that include today's Peru, Bolivia, Ecuador and parts of Argentina, Chile & Colombia. The music is the Himno de la Guardia Indígena by the Orquesta Filarmónica de Bogotá.  All Tezos will go to the Minga Indígena through ÚKUBE, a DAO created to direct an endless river of resources towards the indigenous communities. inquiries: m@manetas.com
